author: marcy hoffman
title: Our law firm has been using Smith.ai…
text: Our law firm has been using Smith.ai for three years and I highly recommend them. Their agents are good but where they excel is in their responsiveness whenever we have as issue or need assistance. They work with us to improve our service and our rep is always .

author: Darla Opper
title: 5 Star account management
text: Tony, our account manager is fantastic. Reviews our account monthly and follows up with a call with his findings. He is there for us with any questions or suggestions. Very satisfied with the services they are providing us!

author: Tina Wileman
title: Cesar, the onboarding specialist
text: Cesar made the onboarding process with Smith.ai an excellent experience. He was professional, polite, and extremely knowledgeable, and he stayed calm and supportive even when my cellular provider became frustrating to deal with. Cesar took the time to explain everything clearly and genuinely helped ease the stress of the situation. I truly appreciated his patience and expertise. I would absolutely recommend Cesar to any new Smith.ai clients and am very grateful for his help.

author: Alexandros cornejo
title: Fantastic!
text: Fantastic!

author: Katlin Swadosh
title: AMAZING! You won't regret it!
text: We have tried several different AI answering systems and the best one we've tried so far - by a LANDSLIDE - has been Smith.ai! The whole team at Smith.ai is incredible, they work hard to make the whole experience smooth and flawless, the live receptionists are all on point, and the AI just nails it every time. We are SO happy we made this switch! Cheers!!

author: Irene Ekdahl
title: Really hard to cancel
text: The AI receptionist transfers calls to live agents without my consent which will raise my bill. Does not save settings. Super dishonest business. Cannot cancel. They make you email to request cancellation!! I had to dig for their phone number only to talk to a receptionist who can't cancel for me! Now I have to wait for a call and hopefully they will cancel. Never again! If you need an AI receptionist look elsewhere.

author: Fernando De Sousa (Next Level Painters)
title: I’m really happy with smith.ai
text: I’m really happy with smith.ai! I switched from a different answering service and honestly, there’s no comparison. all the calls are transparent and you can see exactly what is going on and listen to the calls. Also they block all spam and sales calls at no charge and only charge for real business calls.

author: Daniel Vasconcelos
title: Smith.ai stands out for their excellent support and user-friendly platform
text: Smith.ai has been a great partner for our business. Their team is extremely helpful and genuinely committed to solving problems and addressing requests. They follow up quickly, don’t give up until they fully understand your needs, and are always welcoming and polite. On top of that, the platform itself is very user-friendly—easy to navigate and simple to update configurations. Highly recommended.

author: CXPRS
title: The perfect solution when your business is growing
text:
I have been a Smith client for many years now actually eight years. I’ve had a great experience because they have a combination of live people and AI, which is amazing. 

It’s just the perfect combination and they also make outgoing calls so you can get people to confirm your appointment appointments for you or you can get questions answered without having to waste time making those rounds of calls or adding extra staff if you have a small business like I do.

author: James
title: Reasonable service for price
text: Reasonable service for price. To be clear the AI isn't the favorite of our clients. However, it does an adequate job of capturing data from callers and forwarding them to the correct person. At this time it's an ok fit for law firms but could be better. Improvements include specifically allowing for better instructions for the AI to immediately forward court calls to the relevant attorney. The pricing on this is a little high vs. the quality of the AI but not overly high. Smith AI compensates me for this review.

author: Samantha J
title: Great service!
text: Extremely easy to setup and manage! Using Smith.ai and AI reception was an excellent decision for our law firm as we continue to grow.

author: customer
title: Lack of integrity and honesty
text:
We worked with Smith.ai for most of 2025. At first, we enjoyed the support from the live answering service. Unfortunately, the only time I heard from anyone at Smith.ai was when a member called me to upgrade my plan. I told the representative we did not need the extra call volume and he assured me that it would only work out in our favor by changing our plan. Fast forward 4 months later and I realized we were over paying by more than $700 / month. I called the support team (not easy to get someone) and explained the entire situation. The representative was polite and assured me that she would be in touch soon with a resolution. Never heard from her so I called the following week and got a gentleman on the phone this time. He had no record of the lengthy call I had previously had with the female rep. With no resolution I decided it was time to part ways with this dishonest company. Over 5 months they ripped us off for over $3,000. DO NOT MAKE THE SAME MISTAKE WE DID BY HIRING THIS COMPANY!

Just read your dishonest reply. If you would listen to the recorded call from May that is not how the conversation went. Also, in November why would you not adjust the plan after I called and asked. That phone call did not exist the next time I had to track down a support person. You need to look at your operations more closely and the dishonest that is being sold to clients. Shame on you.

author: Tyler Zygmunt Murtie, LFD
title: Only want easy clients
text: Company was real big and bad about scheduling a consultation. As soon as it got remotely “outside the box” and I asked questions or asked for examples the guy stopped responding. Sent demo links that don’t work. Glad we didn’t sign.

author: Cenmar Fuertes
title: The Strategic Advantages of Smith.ai for a leading restoration and remodeling firm
text:
As a boutique restoration and remodeling firm serving high-value clients throughout Orange County, we needed a phone solution that matched our commitment to excellence. Smith.ai has exceeded our expectations by delivering professional, polished service that resonates with our discerning clientele from the very first contact. Their trained virtual receptionists understand our business and represent our brand flawlessly, providing the white-glove experience our clients expect, whether they're calling about a middle-of-the-night water emergency or planning a luxury kitchen remodel.

The 24/7 availability has been transformative for our emergency response business. Water damage, fire, and mold don't respect business hours, and Smith.ai ensures we never miss a critical call. Beyond just answering, their receptionists intelligently qualify leads, gather essential project details, and route calls appropriately, saving our team countless hours while ensuring every caller receives immediate, knowledgeable assistance. The seamless calendar integration mean appointments are scheduled in real-time and nothing falls through the cracks during our busiest periods.

What truly sets Smith.ai apart is delivering enterprise-level phone coverage without the overhead of hiring multiple in-house receptionists. The flat-rate per-call pricing is predictable and transparent, with no charges for the spam calls that their AI automatically blocks. For Sparkle Restoration, Smith.ai isn't just an answering service;  it's a strategic partner that allows us to maintain our boutique approach while providing the responsiveness and professionalism our clients deserve. 

Highly recommended for any service business where first impressions and rapid response matter.

author: Abdelkadous Amrani
title: Dishonest staff and an untrustworthy…
text: Dishonest staff and an untrustworthy company. I canceled during the trial period, yet they continued charging my credit card for five months without my knowledge. They denied the cancellation, never followed up as promised, and I later discovered they have an F rating with the BBB. This company should be avoided.

author: Zach
title: Smith.ai is the perfect solution for small businesses.
text:
Smith.ai makes call handling for small businesses so simple. The setup process is quick and intuitive. When I have ran into issues the support team i quickly able to help identify my issue and offer a solution. 

Having summaries of calls be sent to me via email allows me to review when I am able + allowing other staff to call back or reach out based on their preferred method of contact which Smith.ai gathers during the call. 

I'm very pleased with this product and happy I came across it!

author: Tom
title: The AI Receptionist product streamlines…
text: The AI Receptionist product streamlines my firm by ensuring we capture every potential client call that comes in... 24/7.

author: Enrique Olivares
title: Great Company
text: The service that the company provides is very professional and on point with what my business needs.

author: Steven
title: The Smith.ai product and personnel are excellent
text: The Smith.ai product is excellent. I have a demanding law practice, and this addition was essential. Every person involved in the process was knowledgeable, kind, patient, and understanding. Steven Murray, Murray Law, LLC. Denver,  CO

author: Valentin Reyes
title: AI.Smith, hands down the most human friendly customer service team.
text: Ai. smith platform in itself is great, but what makes it stand apart is it onboarding team. They are extremely helpful and very proactive in giving solutions to all of the questions you might have about set up and usage of the service.

author: Carol Cadiz
title: Don't hesitate, use Smith!
text: At first, I was hesitant to use Smith's AI Service. But when I saw how customizable it was, I decided to give it a try to use as an overflow reception service for my law firm. I was surprisingly happy. What's more, many people have complimented me and asked about it. I tell them we use"Smith"! Great experience!

author: Roy Wang
title: Smith AI to the rescue!
text: Alex C. provided exceptional service that went above and beyond our already high opinion of the entire Smith AI team and product. They took prompt action after taking the time to understand our needs and followed-up with clear communication. Again, all of this is on top of their wonderful virtual reception that cover all of our firm’s after-hours calls.

author: Erica Carlon
title: If I could give this business zero…
text: If I could give this business zero stars, I would.  They made a lot of promises to get us to sign on and then could not do any of what they said they would do.  Found a different company with far better ai capabilities for less than half the price.  Smith also made me pay for multiple months of service that I didn't use - at all - while they were trying to help set up our account.  RUN, don't walk to find another solution for your business.

author: Marlene Corpus
title: Great experience for me and my customers!
text: I’ve been using Smith AI for the last four months. I was incredibly fearful about what my experience would be working with an AI company that had not been around for very long, but my biggest concerns were how it was going to have an impact on my customers. I just bought out my business partner in June and was essentially relaunching my business without having the sales staff that I previously had. I knew I needed help on a lot of it, I just wasn’t able to afford hiring a sales team to sit in the office and work alongside me. The system is very user-friendly in terms of setting up your AI assistant and my AI assistant answers and handles calls accordingly to how I set it up and based on customer interactions. It truly is remarkable! What I love the most is that if the caller wants to speak to a live person, my AI assistant will transfer the call over to a live person who then intern handles the call so professionally, and according to my preferences and preset standards I set for calls to be answered by live agents. I immediately get an email transcription for my AI assistant and or the live agent to myself, and my colleagues letting me know that a call came in and with every little detail about the call I absolutely love using Smith AI and don’t think I will change. I more believe I will grow my business with them as they grow by adding new call center services.

author: Dat Cao
title: I have been using Smith.AI for their AI Receptionist, SPAM blocker,  FAQ calls and message taker.
text: I have been using Smith.AI for their customizable AI receptionist. It has been a game changer for my solo practitioner business. I spend more time with my patients and am not worried about missing a call or new lead.

author: J Austin
title: Smith.ai used to be fantastic
text:
Smith.ai used to be fantastic, they have been our answering service of choice for over 8 years. Within the last year their quality has declined significantly. Their departments are unorganized, there's no ownership for handling actual customer issues, response time on the back end is significantly delayed. Ironically, attempting to talk with someone who has any authority to make a decision is impossible. Simple issues and questions will go literally weeks before being properly answered, but more likely a canned or ai generated email with be received instead. 

*Update*

Smith.ai has since done a fantastic job to help correct the issues we were experiencing, specifically when Coralyn and Christene got involved following up and continuing to ensure the accounts are updated and working correctly.

author: Shannon Barnett
title: Don't get spammed with solicitors and…
text: Don't get spammed with solicitors and spam calls!  Helps me respond quicker to my customers with answers to their questions when I return calls.

author: Boyd Frizzell
title: Not great receptionist who deny work
text: Not great receptionist who deny work, and state they book but never do. Customer service on management is sub par.  They just want to grow

author: Tawnee Saunders
title: We love Smith.ai
text: We love Smith.ai! The integration was smooth and the customer care we get for all our needs is beyond next level. We started with one location and a few months ago added another. Everyone is so nice and helpful and touch base with you even when you have not asked. They just like to keep in touch so you know they are there and available. True relationship experts! Thank you for being so easy to work with. Just to mention a few names: Hillary, Jose, and Jennifer and several others.

author: C&G Tree Pros
title: Call Handling Made Easy
text: I love how Smith.ai lets me filter calls effortlessly—I can choose which callers go straight to voicemail and even mark spam so it never clogs up my phone. We get a lot of spam calls, and this feature makes everything so much easier in the long run. I also really appreciate the call-scheduling feature. It automatically books appointments based on my calendar, so I don’t have to enter anything manually. It saves me a ton of time and ensures I never miss an important call.

author: Dante Wright
title: Phenomenal Company!
text: This is a phenomenal company to work with. We were lucky enough to have Janina as our onboarding specialist, and from day 1, her and Smith AI's services have made my life easier. I highly recommend this company!

author: jofre gomez
title: AI Smith Answering Services has been a game-changer for our business.
text: AI Smith Answering Services has been a game-changer for our business. Every call is handled professionally, promptly, and with a friendly tone that makes our customers feel valued. They never miss a detail and always pass along accurate messages, saving us time and keeping our operations running smoothly. The team is reliable, easy to work with, and consistently goes above and beyond. Highly recommend their services to any business that wants to improve customer experience and never miss an opportunity.

author: Chris Ashmore
title: Smith.ai has been a fantastic addition
text: Smith.ai has been a fantastic addition for our small business. The onboarding process was a breeze, with their support team guiding us every step of the way. Spam calls are no longer an issue, which saves us tons of time. The dashboard is simple, effective, and easy to navigate, helping us manage calls and leads effortlessly. Highly recommend for businesses looking for a reliable, user-friendly phone answering solution!

author: Fred
title: Reliable, Professional, and Time-Saving
text: Smith.ai has been a huge asset for our business. Their AI receptionist handles calls and messages professionally, ensuring we never miss a lead or client inquiry. The setup was simple, the support team is excellent, and the service integrates smoothly with our CRM. It has saved us time, improved client experience, and given us peace of mind knowing every call is covered.

author: Thorp Law
title: Smith.ai has gone from great to terrible
text: I have used smith.ai for several years. They were great until the last few months. suddenly most of our incoming calls were marked as spam. We have repeatedly informed smith.ai about this problem. They repeatedly assured us of all the steps they were taking to fix the problem. They were supposed to remove the spam blocker for all calls a month ago, they claim they did this, yet we are still getting most of our calls marked as spam. This has cost my business money. This is pathetic. Another good company disintegrates into mediocrity.

author: Lino Coto
title: We started using Smith.ai to help…
text: We started using Smith.ai to help answer calls and they’ve been a great fit. They keep adding useful features and it’s clear they’re committed to improving. Their call forwarding system is excellent, it connects sales opportunities to a rep right away while taking messages for general inquiries. Everything has met my expectations and it lets us stay focused on production knowing calls are handled.

author: Tami Chambers
title: Buyer beware
text:
Buyer beware.  The ai actually sound like a live human.  That’s what got my attention.  The actual humans behind them not so great.   
I quickly realized this wasn’t what we were looking for and canceled but was then contacted by Jorge, an associate at Smith Ai.  He said I could try it risk free for 30 days and suggested an onboarding call to show us how to train and use our Ai. We agreed and tried it for a couple weeks but there are just too many kinks needing worked out still.  We ended up losing too many calls.  I emailed right away to cancel again and got a reply explaining that I now needed to give them 30 days notice again and cancel again and pay for a whole additional month.  
I would be very wary, don’t trust what they tell you. Dishonest sales associates.

author: Dr. Corina Ianculovici DNP, FA
title: I am a healthcare provider and have…
text: I am a healthcare provider and have recently signed up with smith.ai. So far I am loving their service. They learned our needs quickly and the flow is great. The ai was trained within a couple of days, as soon as we completed the FAQ's that is used by the AI to answer questions. They have live agents answering calls 24/7/365 in case the caller wishes to speak to someone. My clinic is now open 24/7.

author: Bobbie
title: Great AI Recommended to anyone needing an answering service.
text: Accuracy and quality of the AI answering the phone and taking information.  I always received messages in a timely manner.

author: LA
title: We hired the AI service a week ago and…
text: We hired the AI service a week ago and have already have two scheduled consultations.  The AI service transfers to live agents to assist with scheduling.  We have had less than stellar experiences with live answering services in the past, so were overjoyed to find that the live agents with Smith AI have been consistently professional, warm and helpful to our potential clients.  So far it's been a great experience!

author: Rose Adrian
title: Life saver
text: It has been a life saver for our tiny clinic. We only have a 3 man team, so getting to our phones is difficult at times. Many leads and and I love the email notifications! We are staying with them!

author: K Driskell
title: Exceptional Setup and Support Experience
text: Smith.ai has been incredible to work with. Their team made the setup process simple and smooth, and their customer service has been top-notch every step of the way.

author: Shannon Pugh Eberhardt
title: Smith AI has been a lifesaver - #1 Partner
text: Smith AI has been a lifesaver.  The ai is professional and asks the right questions appropriately.  The cost is reasonable.  The service has allowed me to handle other things, thereby making me more efficient.  I love Smith AI!!!  Execellent Business Partner!!!

author: Kat Mahn
title: Great receptionist for small business
text: Great ai receptionist for my small travel business.  Send me accurate email with all information.  Notes importance of calls vs spam

author: Thomas J. Curro
title: A great product for a small and large business
text: With SMITH AI I no longer need to answer every call that comes into the office and I can customize the questions that are asked to each each caller. I also receive a written and recorded transcript of each call.

author: Reuben Kamp
title: Smith.AI does a great job filling in…
text: Smith.AI does a great job filling in for our team when we're busy!

author: Lidice Porro
title: Responsive and helpful
text: I love how responsive and helpful the service is.

author: Justin Rosas
title: Everyone was really helpful and it has…
text: Everyone was really helpful and it has bettered our business immensely.

author: Jesus Rosell
title: This is by far the most helpful tool…
text: This is by far the most helpful tool for my trade that I have ever found. The onboarding experience with Zuleica & Nicole is extremely valuable. If you are a small business in need of some help with leads and active customers waste no time and give this a chance. You will be blown away.

author: Stephanie Schmidt
title: We worked with Alex C.
text:
We worked with Alex C., he took the time to understand what our company truly needs, and made sure everything was handled smoothly. He's the kind of account manager who doesn't just check boxes -- he listens, adapts and finds realistic solutions. 

Thanks to Alex C. our company has the support and confidence due to the delivered results he promised!

author: Disc Clinic BC
title: The agents are so incompetent that they…
text: The agents are so incompetent that they always fail to follow call handling instructions. They have extreme difficulty following even the most straight forward scripts. The agents intentionally make mistakes to boost follow up/ outward calls. I emailed Haley, the Client Support, but she procrastinated. The company is only interested in charging you. Be aware!

author: Malik Coleman
title: Thanks to Tim and Daniel we were able…
text: Thanks to Tim and Daniel we were able to troubleshoot our connection to SMITH AI with our GHL account. Fast replies and quick suggestions to get everything working as it should.

author: Christian Augustin
title: Scott was fantastic
text: Scott was fantastic! He was clam, patient, and thorough through the process. He allowed me to explain my concerns, asked further questions, and provided realistic solutions. I was reassured that we were in good hands with Scott assisting our firm with the platform.

author: Deborah Cook
title: Smith.ai has been a wonderful…
text: Smith.ai has been a wonderful "wing-man." After going virtual, I knew I would miss the personal contact with my paralegal and receptionist. I do miss it, but Smith.ai has been a great substitute. They answer my phone as if we are in the same office together, and my clients tell me how nice and helpful my receptionist is!

author: David "El Profe"
title: Great Experience with Smith.ai!
text:
It is with great enthusiasm that I write this letter of recommendation for Adrian De Santiago, Senior Account Manager at Smith.ai. Over the course of my interactions with Adrian, I have been consistently impressed by his unparalleled customer service skills and meticulous attention to detail, which truly set him apart in his field.

Adrian demonstrates a rare combination of professionalism and approachability that makes him an absolute pleasure to work with. His ability to listen carefully to my concerns and tailor solutions to meet specific needs reflects his dedication to providing exceptional service. Adrian goes above and beyond to ensure that all questions are answered thoroughly, leaving no detail overlooked.

In addition to his exemplary customer service, Adrian is proactive and reliable, consistently following up on inquiries and ensuring that every aspect of a project runs smoothly. He is adept at anticipating potential challenges and addressing them before they arise, showcasing his strategic thinking and commitment to excellence.

Adrian’s interpersonal skills are equally noteworthy. He fosters trust and builds strong relationships with clients, always maintaining a positive attitude and a willingness to help. His ability to remain calm under pressure and navigate complex situations with grace is truly commendable.

It is rare to find someone as dedicated, knowledgeable, and personable as Adrian. I have no doubt that his contributions to any team or project will lead to outstanding results. I wholeheartedly recommend him without reservation.

author: Kaye Afan-Bajora
title: Smith Ai has always been there for us
text: Smith Ai has always been there for us. Shoutout to our guy Daniel Hernandez who has quickly accommodated all our questions! It's a great move transitioning to Smith Ai!

author: Trystan
title: No brainer for law firms...
text:
Probably the best overall option for virtual receptionist services for law firms. I work with quite a few law firms, and ALWAYS recommend Smith.AI for their call answering needs. 

Their outbound calling campaign is also very useful if you have leads that come in via form submissions after hours!

author: Maria Jones
title: Efficient, friendly and transparent team!
text: Communication has been wonderful, transparency, and of course, the attention to detail. We've been very happy working with Hilary and Zuleica as they've guided us through every step. Thank you for helping our law firm.

author: chanise price
title: Pleasantly surprised already
text: I hired Smith Ai to assist me with handling calls for my pest control business. I started with the AI voice assistant option before going straight to the live agent plan. I was impressed at how real the AI rep sounded and so have my customers so far. I have received nothing but compliments so far and the callers have been shocked that its really Ai vs a live message and how quick I returned their call. Smith delivers the message immediately after the call ends via email. Another plus is how they can filter and block spam calls! The dashboard allows me to view, mark and block calls too. So far so good!

author: James Hausen
title: The company is following the script and…
text: The company is following the script and they are summarizing the phone call pretty well.

author: Jay
title: they do not do their job
text:
This is now the fourth time the company fail to make a call after telling me that they will. I have lost clients and potentially hundreds of thousands of dollars because of this company's negligence. They started off well about 5 years ago but now in the last year they make so many mistakes, and all they do is say oh they won't charge for this call. Will you just lost me potentially thousands and hundreds of thousands of dollars in revenue and you're going to reimburse me about $10? 

As with almost every company this company has gone too big and it did not keep up with this quality at all. Stay far away you will absolutely lose clients if you sign up with this service.

author: Ryan Keefe
title: Obnoxious don't give your info
text: Obnoxious don't give your info

author: Julia Sverdloff, Esq.
title: Tried this company for over two years…
text: Tried them and have used this company for over two years, yet they were dropping the ball all the time and we lost a lot of business and a lot of clients and time so finally left and using another service this time US based agents …so do yourself a favor and spare yourself the aggravation that we have experienced; tried working it out patiently to no avail. After we switched to a different U.S. based answering service with a U.S based representatives we have not had any issues. All calls are now handled perfectly. Wished left smith sooner than we did.

author: Tai C.
title: Buyer beware
text:
Our experience with Smith.ai was extremely disappointing and frustrating. The first thing we encountered was issues with billing. During the sale, we were told we wouldn’t be charged for our second month until one month after going live. They did not communicate that to billing and we were charged again.

The dashboard setup was a letdown. Despite repeated requests to remove my personal cell phone number from the dashboard and assurances that it would be removed, it remained, with the excuse that it didn't matter since only we could see it. This negligence in addressing our concerns added to our growing dissatisfaction.

The HubSpot integration that was promised during sales calls turned out to be incompatible with our needs (which we had discussed during the sale). This lack of transparency about the limitations of their service was concerning.

The RingCentral setup instructions provided were inadequate (just a link to a generic RingCentral page that did not address what we were looking for), and when seeking support, we were met with unanswered emails as well as conflicting information. The support staff seemed uncoordinated, and it was incredibly frustrating to be told that Smith.ai didn't actually integrate with RingCentral, despite crystal clear marketing claims to the contrary.

Ultimately, our experience with Smith.ai fell far short of their promises and our expectations and was not at all worth $2800/month. We encountered multiple issues, including billing errors, unaddressed concerns, and misleading information about their integrations. We would have had to make too many concessions to continue with their service, and their lack of reimbursement for our poor experience only further exacerbated our disappointment. 

It is shocking when their Head of Client Operations says “the service you have received is far below what we strive to provide, and that is unacceptable” and “never should a client experience what you have” yet they still felt they had delivered what was paid for and did not refund a dime beyond the mistaken second charge. They only offered a credit for the future, which after this experience, we obviously would not use since I cannot recommend them at all.

author: Client Services at JUSTLAW
title: HORRIBLE!!!
text: HORRIBLE!!!! Probably the worst company I have ever interacted with. I'm not a scorned customer - there is no event where they rubbed me the wrong way. I've worked with them for over a year and it's been a parade of incompetence the entire time. They have wasted our ad budget, lost customers for us, and wasted hours of our time. Please do not make the mistake of selecting them, as once you do there are real switching costs. We've been so busy with our business we haven't had time to switch, but I promise you we will. Stay away!!!

author: Thomas Lyon
title: Continuous Billing After Cancellation
text: (SEE EDIT BELOW) Generally an okay company, but one star for questionable billing practices.  Company continues to bill us even though our service was canceled.  We were promised refunds, but this never happened.  We had to dispute the charges with our credit card company and Smith.ai asked us to withdraw our dispute or they wouldn't refund us.  We have called but can never reach anybody.  Only generic email responses that offer no insight or solutions.  Very disappointed. (EDIT 10/05/23: After leaving this review, the VP of Operations, called me to discuss.  He apologized for the error, but couldn't offer a logical reason as to what happened other than it was his fault and it was missed.  He admitted that refunding is an easy process and couldn't explain what happened other than it did.  He stated that he couldn't refund now that the payment was in a dispute status with our bank, but did offer free months of service with his company for the inconvenience. We declined. I asked why nobody would take my calls before or respond to my messages before when I was asking about my refund and there was no reason offered.  There was no action taken until after I submitted a chargeback and posted this negative review.  If I had not done either of these things, nothing would have happened.   He apologized, which is appreciated.  But offered no explanation or assurance about what happened.  ***** He asked us to remove our Trustpilot review as it was hurting the business.  I advised him that I WOULD *update* the review to show that he responded, but that I would tell the truth.  He offered to compensate us for the removal with free services, but we declined as we don't need them.  We're glad he responded to the review, but we wish he would have responded to our request for a refund after we were incorrectly billed after cancellation instead of doing nothing.

author: Irwin
title: Kind of rude chat agent
text: Kind of rude chat agent. She refuses to answer a simple question and end up the chat without asking if I have any further questions.

author: Angela Grijalva
title: Receptionists do not read instructions
text:
UPDATE to 1 Start: Smith.si response's is a material misrepresentation of what transpired. My experience was after they answered calls for just 4 days. No way I was willing to stick around to help this business resolve its customer services challenges and coachable opportunities as they put it. Not on my dime. If you have that $600/month to spend to review another company's work, then by all means this is the service for you. 

To be fair, I did have a phenomenal onboarding experience which fell short after implementation. 

At no time did I say I was too busy to approve revisions and in fact made many through your portal by myself. Your rep did acknowledge her mistake of not including the signature line when "copying and pasting" the sample follow-up message provided. [Potential customers be warned, critical thinking cost extra] As previously stated in my initial post, you have to double triple-check all their work. [Tip: make sure to select cc: option on the dashboard to see what is actually being sent to customers]

This whole “Help us help you” is a lame and very unprofessional attempt to push off responsibility instead of improving their service. I wish I could post screenshots of our correspondence showing their response does not correlate with what actually transpired along with notes where their team referred to me as an attorney. To then post here that you found no "confirmation" that I was referred to as an "attorney" is just shameful.  

Ignoring your guidance? Guidance for what exactly? To change my business operation to fit your model? No, thank you. Just be honest and say your system is inflexible and has limitations. Your team is not trained to ask follow-up questions in order to obtain the information needed to qualify the lead. My automated service can do that. You do not truly have bilingual services. I had to pay for a separate dedicated Spanish line. I have moved on to a service where all reps are actually bilingual and I get to try their service FREE! 
——————————
Receptionists do not read instructions. There were multiple issues, such as scheduling telephone consults without offering in-person or virtual options; not accurately screening callers; Referring to me as an attorney (I am a Legal Document Assistant) which opens up my business for considerable liability.  

Follow-up emails sent to customers did not have a salutation or signature line. To some extent, this can be viewed it's a simple oversight, but there is an expectation of reasonableness. Is it unreasonable to expect a greeting or with requesting that a signature line be included in emails? I don't think so. My Onboard Specialist just went over this morning. And, it still appears that the email signature line did not make it into the revisions. What is unreasonable is the amount of time I'm spending on such a simple request. The fact that emails went out without a greeting or signature line is not how I wish to be presented to the public. It also explains why my client conversion rate dropped immediately after implementing Smith.ai.

author: Stavros Kefalas
title: Dozens of SPAM emails
text: Dozens of SPAM emails

author: Denkai Digital
title: TRUE feedback AVOID AT ANY COST
text:
This is a TRUE feedback from a VERY disappointed & furious customer.

We were looking for a 24/7 answering services for our English customers who can be anywhere in the world.
We signed with this pathetic company 10 days ago
Actually writing this comment, we don't have any working phone number or chat they decided WITHOUT ANY NOTICE to cut their “service “(we are in the middle of the week end) so our potential leads cannot join us and we have to take all our weekend to find a replacement solution with anybody off. 

We took time to write a complete written process to be followed by their agents, the first 3 days we had to explain them what to do, what to not do ( even the process is easy like a 10 years old boy can understand) but they didn't follow it even after several emails & checks by calling & chatting with them they didn’t. 

An example of a recurrent  idiot problem ? their low IQ agents cannot take INTERNATIONAL phone number standard like +XX (country) (cause our customers can be from anywhere) we sent them several emails , 7 ones on this particular point, no changes , I had to speak with 2 of their managers for nothing, guess what , no changes they still took the phone numbers like everyone is from USA (without country code) and this is a example they didn’t follow our other processes either.

Yesterday, been so furious of their incompetence to not follow a single process like this I sent them "do your job this is pathetic" or we will leave 
And then we received a 'we decide to stop'
Their agents for USA after hours  are NOT in USA , they all got Arabic names and they confirm with me (as professionals they are, you can imagine the stupidity)  that they are offshore agents (which is a shame cause our first question when it was time to select the potential supplier was “are your agents based in USA 100 %” ? ) we can pay for this no problem, answer YES : false 

So if you want your customers to not be able to join you or get complete stupid answers to their query by chat or even better receive phone number from potential leads than you cannot reach (without country code), this is the  perfect solution for bankrupt . 

we are still searching today a replacement , so it is now 3 days without phone numbers, We asked them to give a 5 days notice allows us to find an other provider > no answers and yesterday they charged us 149 USD for the chat, we asked for refund > no answers  

AVOID at all cost : a pure NIGHTMARE, those people are CLOWS

author: Dannielle Spencer
title: Had a meeting scheduled to discuss…
text: Had a meeting scheduled to discuss working with these people.  Missed the person calling me called them right back literally and was told "they were in a meeting."  Despite the fact that I had a meeting scheduled for that time.  Unbelievable.  The woman who answered the phone spent 10 minutes trying to figure out how to get a hold of the person I was supposed to meet with.  If this is the way your company is run there is no freaking way I would sign up to have you manage phone calls for my business.  Seeing as how you can't manage phone calls for your own company.

author: Benson Varghese
title: Mixed Feelings
text: I have mixed feelings about Smith.ai. On one hand, the agents do a relatively good job - better than another leading law firm answering service in my opinion. On the other hand, billing and support is terrible. I lost at least  2 days of calls because of a snafu on their end when the account was set up. I lost another day's worth of calls when they accidentally set our calls for forward ... at a time when no changes were requested on our end or any reason that I can see for anyone to have set it to forward on their end. (After not taking responsibility for the first of these events, they offer absolutely no explanation for the second event in their reply below.) Their billing practices are also a little absurd - at least when you have more than one account with them. It's a constant mess. Your needs may be simpler, so YMMV.

author: David (DJ) Holt
title: Overall good value
text: Because they use a large system of people to respond to your calls, the receptionists sometimes do not read directions, which is annoying to keep reminding them. I think pricing is good, although it has crept up in the last few years.
